preqs: One of MTH2010 or MTH2015, plus MTH2032, or ENG2005 and MTH2040

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MTH2010, MTH2015} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MTH2032})
(Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MTH2010, MTH2015} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MTH2032})
Unit was previously coded {ASP3012%, ASP3032, MAA3211, MAA3232, MAT3111, MAT3132}
Unit was previously coded {ASP3012%, ASP3032, MAA3211, MAA3232, MAT3111, MAT3132}
(Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MTH2010, MTH2015} and  (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MTH2032} OR  Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ENG2005, MTH2040}))
Unit was previously coded {ASP3012%, ASP3032, MAA3211, MAA3232, MAT3111, MAT3132}

description: Stellar photometry; observing the stars; star formation; equation of state; reduced equations of stellar structure; polytropic stellar models; full equations of stellar structure; the main sequence; post-main-sequence evolution. Galactic morphology and stellar content; elliptical and spiral galaxies; large-scale structure of the Milky Way; dark matter; potential theory; galactic dynamics-orbits in spherical and axisymmetric potentials. Astronomical data reduction.
